verses.english: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.

derivation: a primitive root;  also as denominative from H5331 (נֶצַח)
strongs_def: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
gloss: excel, chief musician (singer), oversee(-r), set forward.

strongs_def: 'Thou must not destroy'; probably the opening words to a popular song
gloss: Al-taschith.

strongs_def: 'Thou must not destroy'; probably the opening words to a popular song
gloss: Al-taschith.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: an engraving, i.e. (techn.) a poem
gloss: Michtam.

strongs_def: to bolt, i.e. figuratively, to flee suddenly
gloss: chase (away); drive away, fain, flee (away), put to flight, make haste, reach, run away, shoot.

derivation: plural (but always as singular) of an unused noun פָּנֶה; from H6437 (פָּנָה));
strongs_def: the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
gloss: [phrase] accept, a-(be-) fore(-time), against, anger, [idiom] as (long as), at, [phrase] battle, [phrase] because (of), [phrase] beseech, countenance, edge, [phrase] employ, endure, [phrase] enquire, face, favour, fear of, for, forefront(-part), form(-er time, -ward), from, front, heaviness, [idiom] him(-self), [phrase] honourable, [phrase] impudent, [phrase] in, it, look(-eth) (-s), [idiom] me, [phrase] meet, [idiom] more than, mouth, of, off, (of) old (time), [idiom] on, open, [phrase] out of, over against, the partial, person, [phrase] please, presence, propect, was purposed, by reason of, [phrase] regard, right forth, [phrase] serve, [idiom] shewbread, sight, state, straight, [phrase] street, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them(-selves), through ([phrase] -out), till, time(-s) past, (un-) to(-ward), [phrase] upon, upside ([phrase] down), with(-in, [phrase] -stand), [idiom] ye, [idiom] you.

strongs_def: Shaul, the name of an Edomite and two Israelites
gloss: Saul, Shaul.

strongs_def: a cavern (as dark)
gloss: cave, den, hole.

strongs_def: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
gloss: beseech, [idiom] fair, (be, find, shew) favour(-able), be (deal, give, grant (gracious(-ly), intreat, (be) merciful, have (shew) mercy (on, upon), have pity upon, pray, make supplication, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
gloss: beseech, [idiom] fair, (be, find, shew) favour(-able), be (deal, give, grant (gracious(-ly), intreat, (be) merciful, have (shew) mercy (on, upon), have pity upon, pray, make supplication, [idiom] very.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: to flee for protection; figuratively, to confide in
gloss: have hope, make refuge, (put) trust.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

strongs_def: shade, whether literal or figurative
gloss: defence, shade(-ow).

strongs_def: an edge or extremity; specifically (of a bird or army) a wing, (of a garment or bedclothing) a flap, (of the earth) a quarter, (of a building) a pinnacle
gloss: [phrase] bird, border, corner, end, feather(-ed), [idiom] flying, [phrase] (one an-) other, overspreading, [idiom] quarters, skirt, [idiom] sort, uttermost part, wing(-ed).

strongs_def: to flee for protection; figuratively, to confide in
gloss: have hope, make refuge, (put) trust.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: to cross over; used very widely of any transition (literal or figurative; transitive, intransitive, intensive, causative); specifically, to cover (in copulation)
gloss: alienate, alter, [idiom] at all, beyond, bring (over, through), carry over, (over-) come (on, over), conduct (over), convey over, current, deliver, do away, enter, escape, fail, gender, get over, (make) go (away, beyond, by, forth, his way, in, on, over, through), have away (more), lay, meddle, overrun, make partition, (cause to, give, make to, over) pass(-age, along, away, beyond, by, -enger, on, out, over, through), (cause to, make) [phrase] proclaim(-amation), perish, provoke to anger, put away, rage, [phrase] raiser of taxes, remove, send over, set apart, [phrase] shave, cause to (make) sound, [idiom] speedily, [idiom] sweet smelling, take (away), (make to) transgress(-or), translate, turn away, (way-) faring man, be wrath.

derivation: from H1933 (הָוָא) (in the sense of eagerly coveting and rushing upon;
strongs_def: by implication, of falling); desire; also ruin
gloss: calamity, iniquity, mischief, mischievous (thing), naughtiness, naughty, noisome, perverse thing, substance, very wickedness.

verses.header: ¶ To the chief Musician, Altaschith, Michtam of David, when he fled from Saul in the cave.

verses.english: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with H7122 (קָרָא) through the idea of accosting a person met);
strongs_def: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)
gloss: bewray (self), that are bidden, call (for, forth, self, upon), cry (unto), (be) famous, guest, invite, mention, (give) name, preach, (make) proclaim(-ation), pronounce, publish, read, renowned, say.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: an elevation, i.e. (adj.) lofty (compar.); as title, the Supreme
gloss: (Most, on) high(-er, -est), upper(-most).

strongs_def: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
gloss: God (god), [idiom] goodly, [idiom] great, idol, might(-y one), power, strong. Compare names in '-el.'

strongs_def: to end (in the sense of completion or failure)
gloss: cease, come to an end, fail, perfect, perform.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

verses.english: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.

strongs_def: to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications)
gloss: [idiom] any wise, appoint, bring (on the way), cast (away, out), conduct, [idiom] earnestly, forsake, give (up), grow long, lay, leave, let depart (down, go, loose), push away, put (away, forth, in, out), reach forth, send (away, forth, out), set, shoot (forth, out), sow, spread, stretch forth (out).

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
gloss: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

derivation: a primitive root; also  denominative (from H2779 (חֹרֶף))
strongs_def: to pull off, i.e. (by implication) to expose (as by stripping); specifically, to betroth (as if a surrender); figuratively, to carp at, i.e. defame; to spend the winter
gloss: betroth, blaspheme, defy, jeopard, rail, reproach, upbraid.

strongs_def: to inhale eagerly; figuratively, to cover; by implication, to be angry; also to hasten
gloss: desire (earnestly), devour, haste, pant, snuff up, swallow up.

strongs_def: suspension (of music), i.e. pause
gloss: Selah.

strongs_def: to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications)
gloss: [idiom] any wise, appoint, bring (on the way), cast (away, out), conduct, [idiom] earnestly, forsake, give (up), grow long, lay, leave, let depart (down, go, loose), push away, put (away, forth, in, out), reach forth, send (away, forth, out), set, shoot (forth, out), sow, spread, stretch forth (out).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
gloss: favour, good deed(-liness, -ness), kindly, (loving-) kindness, merciful (kindness), mercy, pity, reproach, wicked thing.

strongs_def: stability; (figuratively) certainty, truth, trustworthiness
gloss: assured(-ly), establishment, faithful, right, sure, true (-ly, -th), verity.

verses.english: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to sever;
strongs_def: a bisection, i.e. (by implication) the centre
gloss: among(-st), [idiom] between, half, [idiom] (there-, where-), in(-to), middle, mid(-night), midst (among), [idiom] out (of), [idiom] through, [idiom] with(-in).

derivation: or (Ezekiel 19:2) לְבִיָּא; irregular masculine plural לְבָאִים; irregular feminine plural לְבָאוֹת; from an unused root meaning;  compare H738 (אֲרִי)
strongs_def: to roar; a lion (properly, a lioness as the fiercer (although not a roarer;))
gloss: (great, old, stout) lion, lioness, young (lion).

strongs_def: to lie down (for rest, sexual connection, decease or any other purpose)
gloss: [idiom] at all, cast down, (lover-)lay (self) (down), (make to) lie (down, down to sleep, still with), lodge, ravish, take rest, sleep, stay.

strongs_def: properly, to lick, i.e. (by implication) to blaze
gloss: burn (up), set on fire, flaming, kindle.

strongs_def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
gloss: [phrase] afflicted, age, (Ahoh-) (Ammon-) (Hachmon-) (Lev-) ite, (anoint-) ed one, appointed to, ([phrase]) arrow, (Assyr-) (Babylon-) (Egypt-) (Grec-) ian, one born, bough, branch, breed, [phrase] (young) bullock, [phrase] (young) calf, [idiom] came up in, child, colt, [idiom] common, [idiom] corn, daughter, [idiom] of first, [phrase] firstborn, foal, [phrase] very fruitful, [phrase] postage, [idiom] in, [phrase] kid, [phrase] lamb, ([phrase]) man, meet, [phrase] mighty, [phrase] nephew, old, ([phrase]) people, [phrase] rebel, [phrase] robber, [idiom] servant born, [idiom] soldier, son, [phrase] spark, [phrase] steward, [phrase] stranger, [idiom] surely, them of, [phrase] tumultuous one, [phrase] valiant(-est), whelp, worthy, young (one), youth.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

strongs_def: a tooth (as sharp); specifically  ivory; figuratively, a cliff
gloss: crag, [idiom] forefront, ivory, [idiom] sharp, tooth.

strongs_def: a lance (for thrusting, like pitching a tent)
gloss: javelin, spear.

derivation: from H2686 (חָצַץ); also by interchange for H6086 (עֵץ)
strongs_def: properly, a piercer, i.e. an arrow; by implication, a wound; figuratively, (of God) thunderbolt; the shaft of aspear
gloss: [phrase] archer, arrow, dart, shaft, staff, wound.

derivation: or לָשֹׁן; also (in plural) feminine לְשֹׁנָה; from H3960 (לָשַׁן);
strongs_def: the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water)
gloss: [phrase] babbler, bay, [phrase] evil speaker, language, talker, tongue, wedge.

strongs_def: drought; also a cutting instrument (from its destructive effect), as a knife, sword, or other sharp implement
gloss: axe, dagger, knife, mattock, sword, tool.

strongs_def: sharp
gloss: sharp.

verses.english: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.

strongs_def: to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively)
gloss: bring up, exalt (self), extol, give, go up, haughty, heave (up), (be, lift up on, make on, set up on, too) high(-er, one), hold up, levy, lift(-er) up, (be) lofty, ([idiom] a-) loud, mount up, offer (up), [phrase] presumptuously, (be) promote(-ion), proud, set up, tall(-er), take (away, off, up), breed worms.

gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);

gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

verses.english: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.

strongs_def: a net (as catching animals)
gloss: net(-work).

strongs_def: properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
gloss: certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, [idiom] very deed.

strongs_def: a stroke, literally or figuratively (in various applications, as follow)
gloss: anvil, corner, foot(-step), going, (hundred-) fold, [idiom] now, (this) [phrase] once, order, rank, step, [phrase] thrice, (often-), second, this, two) time(-s), twice, wheel.

strongs_def: to curve
gloss: bow down (self).

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

strongs_def: properly, to dig; figuratively, to plot; generally, to bore or open
gloss: dig, [idiom] make (a banquet), open.

strongs_def: a pit-fall
gloss: pit.

strongs_def: to fall, in a great variety of applications (intransitive or causative, literal or figurative)
gloss: be accepted, cast (down, self, (lots), out), cease, die, divide (by lot), (let) fail, (cause to, let, make, ready to) fall (away, down, -en, -ing), fell(-ing), fugitive, have (inheritance), inferior, be judged (by mistake for H6419 (פָּלַל)), lay (along), (cause to) lie down, light (down), be ([idiom] hast) lost, lying, overthrow, overwhelm, perish, present(-ed, -ing), (make to) rot, slay, smite out, [idiom] surely, throw down.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to sever;
strongs_def: a bisection, i.e. (by implication) the centre
gloss: among(-st), [idiom] between, half, [idiom] (there-, where-), in(-to), middle, mid(-night), midst (among), [idiom] out (of), [idiom] through, [idiom] with(-in).

strongs_def: suspension (of music), i.e. pause
gloss: Selah.

verses.english: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.

strongs_def: properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
gloss: certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, [idiom] very deed.

gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

gloss: certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, [idiom] very deed.

derivation: or (the original form) שׁוּר; (1 Samuel 18:6), a primitive root (rather identical with H7788 (שׁוּר) through the idea of strolling minstrelsy);
strongs_def: to sing
gloss: behold (by mistake for H7789 (שׁוּר)), sing(-er, -ing man, -ing woman).

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

verses.english: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes);
strongs_def: to wake (literally or figuratively)
gloss: (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), [idiom] master, raise (up), stir up (self).

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes);
strongs_def: to wake (literally or figuratively)
gloss: (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), [idiom] master, raise (up), stir up (self).

strongs_def: a skin-bag for liquids (from collapsing when empty); hence, a vase (as similar in shape when full); also a lyre (as having a body of like form)
gloss: bottle, pitcher, psaltery, vessel, viol.

derivation: from a unused root meaning to twang;
strongs_def: a harp
gloss: harp.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes);
strongs_def: to wake (literally or figuratively)
gloss: (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), [idiom] master, raise (up), stir up (self).

strongs_def: dawn (literal, figurative or adverbial)
gloss: day(-spring), early, light, morning, whence riseth.

verses.english: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
gloss: folk, men, nation, people.

strongs_def: the Lord (used as a proper name of God only)
gloss: (my) Lord.

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

strongs_def: properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
gloss: lest, neither, no, none (that...), not (any), nothing.

derivation: or לְאוֹם; from an unused root meaning to gather;
strongs_def: a community
gloss: nation, people.

verses.english: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
gloss: [phrase] aloud, elder(-est), [phrase] exceeding(-ly), [phrase] far, (man of) great (man, matter, thing,-er,-ness), high, long, loud, mighty, more, much, noble, proud thing, [idiom] sore, ([idiom]) very.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
gloss: favour, good deed(-liness, -ness), kindly, (loving-) kindness, merciful (kindness), mercy, pity, reproach, wicked thing.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: a powder (as beaten small); by analogy, a thin vapor; by extension, the firmament
gloss: cloud, small dust, heaven, sky.

strongs_def: stability; (figuratively) certainty, truth, trustworthiness
gloss: assured(-ly), establishment, faithful, right, sure, true (-ly, -th), verity.

verses.english: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.

strongs_def: to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively)
gloss: bring up, exalt (self), extol, give, go up, haughty, heave (up), (be, lift up on, make on, set up on, too) high(-er, one), hold up, levy, lift(-er) up, (be) lofty, ([idiom] a-) loud, mount up, offer (up), [phrase] presumptuously, (be) promote(-ion), proud, set up, tall(-er), take (away, off, up), breed worms.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).
